companySalaries.whatAreCareerLevels: What are the career levels at
companySalaries.levelsTooltip: Levels codify the hierarchy, scope & responsibility of employees in a company. Those at the first level (ex. Entry Level) are typically employees with the least industry experience. Companies decide pay bands for each level - our data exposes these ranges for you.
companySalaries.checkOutLatestBlogPost: Check out our latest blog post on how

vestMessage.averageTotalCompensationCalculated: the average total compensation is calculated by dividing the total stock grant evenly by 4
vestMessage.alsoAverageSignOnBonuses: . We also average out the sum of the sign on bonuses over 4 years to calculate the total bonus.

generatedOccupationSchema.name: Software Engineer
generatedOccupationSchema.description: Designs and develops software products for a company

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the highest Software Engineer salary at Comcast in United States?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The highest paying salary package reported for a Software Engineer at Comcast in United States sits at a yearly total compensation of $527,697. This includes base salary as well as any potential stock compensation and bonuses.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much do Comcast Software Engineer employees get paid in United States?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The median yearly total compensation reported at Comcast for the Software Engineer role in United States is $147,000.
